attributes.action: HELP THE HOMELESS AND DESTITUTE! Signpost help centres for London's needy.
attributes.additional_details:
The current Mayor of London recently outlined his "[commitment] to tackling London’s housing crisis in whatever form it takes".

In light of such circumstances, I feel it necessary to draw attention to the tourism-oriented layout of public maps around the City, and hope that it would be possible to include the directions of preventative or remedial services for those in need.
attributes.background:
HELP THE HOMELESS AND DESTITUTE: add directions to hostels/charity centres on local maps around the City of London. 

https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2016/jul/16/sadiq-khan-shame-of-london-homeless
